text: Hagi Ideni hozafima me'nea zafaramimpintira ina zafamo kagri knara huno za'zara huno ragi'ane zafa me'ne? Hagi kagra Ideni hozafima me'nea zafaramine, magoka fri vahe kumapina uramita zamagoza anoma taga osu' vahe'ma kazinteti'ma zamahazage'zama mase'naza kumapi vugahaze. Ama ana zantamina Ferone mika sondia vahe'are fore hugahie huno Ra Anumzamo'a hu'ne.
